mapper.select: SELECT rank, cos_sim as cosineSimilarity FROM KOMANTLE_WORD_RANK_TABLE WHERE TRUNC(CREATED_AT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND word = #{word}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOMANTLE_WORD_RANK_TABLE (word, rank, cosine_similarity) WITH word_sim AS ( SELECT e1.word AS word, cosine_similarity(#{word}, e1.word) AS similarity FROM EMBEDDING_TABLE e1 ), ranked_words AS ( SELECT word, similarity, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY similarity DESC) AS ranking FROM word_sim ) SELECT word, CASE WHEN word = #{word} THEN 0 ELSE ranking - 1 END AS rank, similarity FROM ranked_words;

INSERT INTO KOMANTLE_TRIALS (word, rank, cos_sim, uuid, try_seq) VALUES (#{word}, #{rank}, #{cosineSimilarity}, #{uuid}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(try_seq), 0) + 1 FROM KOMANTLE_TRIALS WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND TRUNC(CREATED_AT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT word, rank, cos_sim, uuid FROM KOMANTLE_TRIALS WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND TRUNC(CREATED_AT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY try_seq DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
